subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Twins’ Carlos Silva shut down host Detroit for seven and two-thirds innings in a 2-0 victory last night that put the Tigers on the brink of being eliminated from the playoff race.
snippet: The Minnesota Twins’ Carlos Silva shut down host Detroit for seven and two-thirds innings in a 2-0 victory last night that put the Tigers on the brink of being eliminated from the playoff race.
